ingredients.ingredient: 4 bolillo rolls, sliced in half lengthwise
1 (7 ounce) package BordenÂ® Southwestern Cheddar & Monterey Jack Shredded Cheese
Mexican salsa or pico de gallo, for serving

cookingTips: Spread butter evenly on the cut sides of the bolillo rolls before toasting
Warm the refried beans before spreading so they distribute more easily
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly, watching carefully to avoid burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through assembling and broiling molletes to achieve crispy bread with melted cheese and warm beans.
